storyInfo: Blue Poison and Glaucus bring along some sweet treats while Indigo is getting a haircut. However, Indigo mistakenly drinks a beverage that Blue Poison made for Glaucus. To protect her friends' image, she makes a bold decision.

attributes.content: *snip* *snip*...
*snip* *snip* *snip*...
I'm really jealous of you, Indigo. You've got such long, wonderful hair. You look amazing no matter how we style it.
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: You think so? Why, I've never really thought of it that way.
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: What do you mean?
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: When I still lived by the seaside, my hair often got pretty damp because of how humid the air there is.
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: Tilt your head a little to the left, please—Okay, just like that. Don't move.
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: *snip* *snip*...
...That stopped happening after I came to Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: But the air has gotten a lot drier the last couple days, and it's gotten more difficult to take care of my hair.
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: We've probably driven into a more arid area.
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: *snip* *snip*...
Is that so...?
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: Right... I suppose that's probably why.
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: Because of how dry the air is, I've started having static electricity build up in my hair.
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: *snip*
Even hair as pretty as yours? Is it serious?
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: Let me think... When I comb my hair in the morning, it's like...
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: Like...?
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: How do I describe this...?
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: Like D32 Steel.
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: And sometimes, the shorter strands stand up like RMA70-12.
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: Bang!
Did static build up in my hair again?
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: Uh, no, that's not what it was...
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: —But I never knew you had such serious problems with static!
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: Static can really hurt your hair. I've had a lot of trouble with it myself! You can't just leave it alone. You have to take care of it!
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: Hm... Is it really so scary?
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: It's not a huge problem if it's only for a short while, but if it lasts, your hair will start to get dryer. You'll have to worry about breakage and hair loss, too.
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: Besides, Indigo, you're an Iberian. You just said you used to live by the sea, and your hair was often damp, right?
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: Oh, yes.
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: Then that's all the more reason not to ignore this. Your hair is used to humid environments, but you suddenly moved to a dry area. It'll upset your hair more than it does others'.
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: I suggest you try these anti-static hair masks. They work really well keeping moisture in, and they're a great fit for your hair since it's on the dry side.
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: Why, this smells wonderful.
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: How much?
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: No need to pay me.
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: This is only a trial-size pack, so feel free to take it. If you think it works for you, you'll just need to file an application with the Logistics Department and they'll issue you regular ones for free.
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: Blue Poison? Glaucus? Why, hello there.
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: Hello, Indigo and Goldenglow.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: Oh, Blue Poison... and Glaucus. Hello.
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: I figured it might take you a little longer to cut Indigo's hair, so we brought you something to eat.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: Thanks, you two. She just finished, actually. Let's have something to eat before the treatment.
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: Do you want some, Goldenglow? Blue Poison's really good at making desserts.
attributes.name: Glaucus

attributes.content: I... I would love to try some, but this... this cake is colored lake blue... What exactly...?
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: Don't worry, it's nothing difficult to make. It gets its color from only one ingredient.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: One ingredient...? But what could possibly make your batter... um... this color?
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: It's not a very common ingredient, probably. The kind that you don't want to eat too much of in one go.
attributes.name: Glaucus

attributes.content: Eh—? Eh?! D-Does that mean—No, that can't be this color...
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: Is this that thing that I keep hearing about...?
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: Sorry, sorry. We're just pulling your leg.
attributes.name: Glaucus

attributes.content: It's nothing as scary as you're thinking. Actually, it's quite normal.
attributes.name: Glaucus

attributes.content: But what exactly gave it this color...?
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: It's food coloring.
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: —Coloring?
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: Naturally.
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: Blue Poison is very particular about the color of her desserts. If normal ingredients can't bring her ideas to life, she has no choice but to rely on food coloring.
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: Phew...
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: And here I was thinking if anything could've given it this color... it'd have to be something poisonous.
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: So, um, is it okay I give this cake a try?
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: Okay... Here I go.
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: (Munches)
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: (Eyes glitter in a golden glow)
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: Can I have another?
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: Of course. Help yourself.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: We have some drinks here, too. Right, try some of this rose-colored one. It goes really well with desserts—
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: Huh? What just happened?!
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: It looks like the power went out.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: I'll head outside and check out the circuits. You guys stay here. I'll be right back.
attributes.name: Glaucus

attributes.content: Why did the power go out all of a sudden? I-Is it because I didn't keep my static under control?
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: I don't think you're the reason.
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: I'm not?
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: When you cut my hair just now, I didn't get shocked even once. That's why I don't think it was you.
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: Um... Actually, I did get shocked once...
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: Really?
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: Speaking of static electricity, maybe some appliance in here short-circuited?
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: Why, that might just be—Oh, right!
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: Is the power back?
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: That's Indigo's Originium Arts.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: You're right. It doesn't look much like the lights we usually have here. The colors are so much warmer.
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: But wouldn't this take a toll on your body?
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: It's no problem.
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: If you start feeling tired from casting your Arts, be sure to rehydrate and have something sweet.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: You don't have to worry. I used to be a lighthouse keeper. Even without any equipment, this much is nothing to write home about.
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: I'll light up our surroundings. You should go back to your rooms and see if your appliances are still working.
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: Thanks, Indigo!
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: Let's see. Hairdryer, hair clippers, heater...
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: There's a water kettle and a TV here...
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: Blue Poison, can I have something to drink? I'm a little thirsty.
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: Help yourself. Remember, it's the rose one.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: Why, thank you.
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: The perm machine... Okay, that's all the appliances I have. They're all working fine.
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: Everything looks okay over here, too. It might be an external issue. We'll figure out what to do after Glau gets back.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: Indigo, you can stop casting now. Come take a break.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: Indigo?
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: I'm more used to places with at least some light.
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: Light can give us hope. That's what my teacher always told me.
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: Why, when I used to be a lighthouse keeper, my teacher and I would try to keep the lights up for as long as we could.
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: As long as you don't tire yourself out.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: It's not a big deal, like I said.
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: This power cut reminds me... We used to have ones at night back when I was still in school in Victoria.
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: That must have been inconvenient.
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: I'm sure that's what my more zealous classmates thought. That's why they always lit candles to keep studying.
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: Though, to most of my classmates, the power cuts were basically just bonus holidays. Everyone would start chatting or do something else.
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: We would chat by the candlelight and eat the snacks we snuck into the classrooms... Kind of like what we're doing right now, actually.
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: Then... should I put out the light?
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: Oh, you don't have to. Without the candles, the classroom would have been pitch black. No one likes it that dark.
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: I suppose you're right.
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: I just asked. The power's not very stable right now. That's all. It'll be back very—
attributes.name: Glaucus

attributes.content: —And there we go.
attributes.name: Glaucus

attributes.content: Phew.
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: We'd better get going now. Keep the cake.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: Thanks, you two! And remember to come to me if you ever need a haircut!
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: Glau will gladly take you up on the offer.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: But I'll have to pass. It's not very likely, but it's still somewhat dangerous to make physical contact with me. I have to be extra careful.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: Is that so...
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: Alright, off we go now.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: Okay! I'll wash the cups and bring them back to you when we're done.
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: Thanks. Just leave them in front of my dorm room.
attributes.name: Glaucus

attributes.content: I knew that Blue Poison was a master of poisons, but I never knew she was such a friendly person too.
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: Yeah, she really is.
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: But when we first met, she held a crossbow bolt to my neck because she didn't know if I was a friend or a foe.
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: Huh?!
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: Oh, it's nothing, really. She pulled it back after we cleared our misunderstanding.
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: She figured out I'm an Iberian from just a few questions, and then explained how somebody else must have mistook me for a bounty hunter.
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: (Sounds kinda weird...)
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: Okay, I'm finished with the cake.
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: Yep, that was tasty!
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: Let's move on to the next step. Let me put on some hair protector—
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: Indigo?
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: I-I have a question.
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: Okay...?
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: W-What color was the drink you just drank?
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: Hm, let me think... Blue Poison said it was 'rose.'
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: Oh, yours is light purple.
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: What does it taste like? Can I try?
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: D-Don't touch it.
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: That one's...
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: (No, I can't. I can't tell her about it.)
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: (It took so much work just to improve her impression of Blue Poison.)
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: Why, that's... Glaucus's drink. It was pretty dark earlier, so I couldn't see the color.
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: So you two drank each other's drinks?
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: Right, that's it...
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: You seem kind of giddy... Did hers have alcohol in it perhaps?
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: No, but... that's pretty close.
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: You don't seem too well. Do you want to rest a little first?
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: Right, okay. I'll go get some rest...
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: Alright. I'll take care of the tray and the cups—
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: N-No, don't! Don't touch Glaucus's drink.
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: Huh? Why not?
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: (Well...)
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: I-I'll wash the cups. T-That's my own cup... so I-I'll wash it myself.
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: Are you sure you're feeling up to it?
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: You don't have to force yourself. I can do the dishes; you just go get some rest.
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: W-Wait!
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: Huh? Indigo?
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: *chugs the drink*
Did you just drink the rest...?
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: I... Sorry, but I... I need to pay a visit to Medical.
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: Medical?
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: Why, yes. I... I'm going... to Medical.
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: P-Please don't touch the cup. Wait... Wait till I'm back...
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: You really don't look very well at all to me. How about I come with you?
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: N-No need. I'm fine, really... P-Please just wait... wait here... After I get back, we... we need to work... on... um... my hair...
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: Indigo stands up and stumbles out of the room like she is absolutely inebriated.
What is it with her...?
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: Maybe she's having an allergic reaction to something in Glaucus's drink?
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: I need to go check on her—
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: Goldenglow? Where's Indigo?
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: Blue Poison?
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: She said she was going to pay Medical a visit and stumbled outside. I'm really worried about her. Is she okay?
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: You said she left on her own, unsteadily? She didn't pass out, did she?
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: No, she didn't... but I'm worried she might on her way there. She looked pretty smashed.
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: (Relaxed sigh)
attributes.name: Glaucus

attributes.content: Where's the rest of her drink? I'll take care of it.
attributes.name: Glaucus

attributes.content: You mean the light purple one?
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: Yeah, that one.
attributes.name: Glaucus

attributes.content: She drank half of it, then she looked like she was a little sick. I was going to pour it out and wash the cup, but she wouldn't let me. In the end, she even drank the rest of it.
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: She drank the entire cup, and she could still trudge herself out of the room?
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: More or less...
attributes.name: Goldenglow

attributes.content: What should I say... She's really growing fast.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: (Chuckles)
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: The stuff in that drink isn't very strong. As long as she can make it out the door and to the Medical Department, there is nothing to worry about.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: But just to be safe, Glaucus, you should go to Medical and check on her—
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: Excuse me, are Operators Blue Poison and Glaucus here?
Are you feeling better?
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Why, yes, much better.
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: Blue Poison's antidote works fast, huh.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Of course, you've gotten yourself poisoned way too many times now. It's no wonder you're building up a resistance against it.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Haha...
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: Come to think of it, Blue Poison's usually pretty good at keeping her toxins under control, but you ingested a lot more this time than usual. What happened?
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: That's because I made a mistake and drank Glaucus's drink.
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: Glaucus? From what I remember, she's practically immune to just about any kind of toxin.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Right, that's why when Blue Poison makes drinks for Glaucus, she often adds ingredients that would normally be toxic. To Glaucus, they're nothing more than quirky seasonings to spice things up.
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: Like how coffee's poisonous to some animals?
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Yeah, that one.
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: Why, if someone else had drank it, their symptoms would have been much worse.
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: Most people wouldn't.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Do you want some more water?
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: No thanks.
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: Hm... I vaguely remember running into somebody on my way to the Medical Department, and they brought me here...
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: It was Operator Irene. She brought you in and left just as quickly.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Irene. Irene...
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: The Inquisitor?!
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: Right, it's the young—
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Excuse me for a moment!
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: Hey, you just got up! You should take it easy—Where are you even going?!
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: P-Phew... I'm still feeling a little dizzy...
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: No, I have to hurry—
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: Irene?
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: You're quick to recover.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: It's true that I am more resistant to toxins—No, that's not what I wanted to talk about!
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: Irene, please don't blame Blue Poison and Glaucus. They didn't do it on purpose!
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: (Sighs)
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: I was the one who drank Glaucus's drink by mistake. I'm the one to blame!
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: (Sighs even more heavily)
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Operator Indigo... I suggest you go back to Medical to rest a little longer.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Huh...? Why?
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: It seems your head isn't quite clear yet. You're obviously conflating me with whatever distorted image you have of the Inquisitors.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Huh...?
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: They already told me how you drank something meant for Operator Glaucus.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: While it might perk her up because of her resistance to toxins, most people would be poisoned just by coming into contact with it.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Besides, there was that hair stylist who was sparking nonstop the whole time as witness. I have no doubt that this was nothing but an unfortunate little accident.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: So... they're safe, right?
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: What do I do with you...?
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: I'm an operator of Rhodes Island now. Even if you were intentionally poisoned, I don't have the authority to judge them on my own.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: As both a Rhodes Island operator and an Iberian, I'm sure you know this, don't you?
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Ugh...
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: S-Sorry.
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: It's okay. As long as you understand.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Now, you were just poisoned. You really should go back and get some rest.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Okay...
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: Anything else?
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: There are some lake blue cake crumbs on your lips.
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: This... It was my duty to investigate the truth. I had to make sure...
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Really?
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: Ugh.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: (Quietly) At least... that's what I was thinking for the first slice.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: (Quietly) Of course, the stylist was on the verge of tears when she recommended it to me. That played a role, too.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: I see.
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: You may not like it when I put it like this, but you are... rather different from most other Inquisitors I've met.
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: Really?
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Most Iberian Inquisitors I'm familiar with try their best to avoid contact with the Ægir, even if they know they're innocent.
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: I admit I may be a bit of a special case in this regard.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: However, if I ever uncover any evil lurking here, I will personally see it eradicated.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: What about you, Operator Indigo?
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Me?
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: I want to hear what you think about all this. As a Rhodes Island operator or as an Iberian. Doesn't matter.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Why, not much at all, really. All I know is that both of them are my friends, and I don't want to see them wrongfully accused because of me.
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: I like your answer.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Goodbye, Operator Indigo. I enjoyed our conversation.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Goodbye, Irene—
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: Hold on, that fragrance...
attributes.name: Indigo

attributes.content: Did Goldenglow recommend you the same hair mask?
attributes.name: Indigo
